verses.roman:
tomā-duṅhāra kṛpāte iṅhāra ha-u taiche śakti
yāte vivarite pārena kṛṣṇa-rasa-bhakti

synonyms: tomā-duṅhāra kṛpāte—by the mercy of both of You; iṅhāra—of Rūpa Gosvāmī; ha-u—let there be; taiche—such; śakti—power; yāte—by which; vivarite—to describe; pārena—is able; kṛṣṇa-rasa-bhakti—the transcendental mellows of devotional service.
translation: May Rūpa Gosvāmī, by Your mercy, become so powerful that he will be able to describe the transcendental mellows of devotional service."
